title: How to Change (Or Hide) Your Date of Birth on Facebook

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's in either the bottom-right corner (iPhone/iPad) or the top-right corner of the screen (Android). [1] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy . It's the option with a gray gear icon about halfway down the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is the first option under Settings & Privacy .

steps.title: Tap See more in Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap See more in Accounts Center . This is at the top of the page. A new page will open. This is also where you can activate two-factor authentication .

steps.title: Tap Personal details.
steps.content: Tap Personal details . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Birthday.
steps.content: Tap Birthday . This is underneath your email address.

steps.title: Tap Edit.
steps.content: Tap Edit . This is to the right of your current birthday.

steps.title: Enter a new birthday.
steps.content: Enter a new birthday. Tap the field, and then use the scroll menu to select a new month, date, and year.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This is the blue button. A pop-up window will appear with your new birthday.

steps.title: Tap Confirm.
steps.content: Tap Confirm . This will save your changes.

steps.title: Change who can see your birthday (optional).
steps.content: Change who can see your birthday (optional). If you want to hide your birthday from others, do the following: Return to the Birthday page. Tap Who can see your birthday on Facebook . Tap Change visibility on Facebook . Tap the person icon next to Birthday and Birth Year . Select Public , Friends of friends , Friends , or Only me .

steps.title: Click your profile icon at the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click your profile icon at the top-right corner. This displays your Facebook profile . If you aren't already logged in , enter your email address and password to do so now. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings & privacy . You can find this below your name.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click See more in Accounts Center.
steps.content: Click See more in Accounts Center . This is in the left panel, at the top.

steps.title: Click Personal details.
steps.content: Click Personal details . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Click Birthday.
steps.content: Click Birthday . This is underneath your email address. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Edit.
steps.content: Click Edit . This is to the right of your current birthday.

steps.title: Enter a new birthday.
steps.content: Enter a new birthday. Click the field, and then use the scroll menu to select a new month, date, and year.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This is the blue button. A pop-up window will appear with your new birthday.

steps.title: Click Confirm.
steps.content: Click Confirm . This will save your changes.

steps.title: Change who can see your birthday (optional).
steps.content: Change who can see your birthday (optional). If you want to hide your birthday, do the following: Return to the Birthday page. Click Who can see your birthday on Facebook . Click Change visibility on Facebook . Click the person icon next to Birthday . Select Public , Friends of friends , Friends , or Only me . Click Save .
